fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Green symbolizes luck, nature, and health. Green may visit a player to grant good health to them, healing them, and granting Powerful defense to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The targets of Green will not be told what saved them.
- Green may only ever heal itself once per game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Paint the Town into a rainbow!
